<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Flame Drake](/Monsters.aspx?ID=160)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The distant kin of red dragons, flame drakes thankfully lack the intelligence and ambition of their larger cousins, but are no less territorial or violent. Flame drakes dwell near volcanoes and magma, but it’s not unheard of for one to drift into nearby areas like forests or wooded hills. Their scales are usually some shade of red, occasionally fading to smoky blacks and grays along the edges of their wings and the tips of their tails.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Dragon](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2)): DC 20

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Drake_FlameDrake.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Flame Drake](/Monsters.aspx?ID=160)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Dragon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=50" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 131</row>

**Perception** +12; darkvision, scent (imprecise) 30 feet, smoke vision

**Languages**
[Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +10, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +12, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +9, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +10

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +1

**Con** +3

**Int** -1

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Smoke Vision** Smoke doesn’t impair a flame drake’s vision; it ignores concealment from smoke.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 22 

**Fort** +12 

**Ref** +10 

**Will** +10 

</row>

**HP** 75

**Immunities**
fire, paralyzed, unconscious

**Weaknesses**
cold 10

**Attack of Opportunity** <actions string="Reaction" /> Fangs only.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, fly 50 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fangs +14,
**Damage** 2d8+5 piercing plus 1d6 fire

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tail +14 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d6+5 bludgeoning

**Draconic Frenzy** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The flame drake makes two Fangs Strikes and one Tail Strike in any order.

**Fireball Breath** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)) The flame drake expels a ball of flame to a range of 180 feet that explodes in a 20-foot burst. Creatures in the burst take 6d6 fire damage (DC 22 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). The flame drake can't use Fireball Breath again for 1d6 rounds.

**Speed Surge** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114)) The fire drake moves up to twice its Speed. It can do this three times per day.

</column>
